content:
HSPC is putting on an HIT Developers Conference this month in New Orleans (March 30-31). I'll be doing a talk on CDS Hooks (overview of the project, plans for 2017). There are some other great talks lined up that this community would find interesting.

If you're planning on attending, reply here and perhaps we can meetup as group during the conference.

You can read more from Rick's announcement here in Zulip.
